title: Vote begins to appoint Deputy Speaker
body_lines: Vote began to appoint Deputy Speaker of Parliament as two names had been nominated.
The opposition said they nominated Rohini Kaviratne as the Deputy Speaker as the Prime Minister had informed them to nominate a female MP.
The Speaker decided to hold a vote as the SLPP nominated Ajith Rajapaksa as the Deputy Speaker.
The Prime Minister informed the Parliament Deputy Speaker should be elected unanimously without spending the day for a vote.
